mapper.sql: id, article_id, author_id, content, reply_cnt, create_time
${alias}.id, ${alias}.article_id AS articleId, ${alias}.author_id AS authorId, ${alias}.content, ${alias}.reply_cnt AS replyCnt, ${alias}.create_time AS createTime,
mapper.select: SELECT ac.id, u.name, u.avatar, ac.author_id authorId, ac.content, ac.reply_cnt replyCnt, ac.create_time createTime FROM article_cmt ac LEFT JOIN user u ON ac.author_id = u.id WHERE ac.article_id = #{articleId} ORDER BY ac.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
mapper.update: UPDATE article_cmt SET reply_cnt = reply_cnt + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
